- [ ] I updated docs in `docs/` (or confirmed no docs changes are needed).
- [ ] I updated the relevant section `README.md` index links.
- [ ] I set/updated `owner`, `status`, and `last_reviewed` in frontmatter.
- [ ] I linked relevant issue/PRD/RFC/ADR IDs.
- [ ] I avoided committing sensitive data.
